string.name: question_one
string.b: #1: How many planets are there in our Solar System?

string.name: question_two
string.b: #2: Which of these are moons of Jupiter?

string.name: question_three
string.b: #3: Which planet is larger in diameter, Uranus or Neptune?

string.name: question_four
string.b: #4: From nearest to furthest from the Sun, what is the correct order of the planets?

resources.string: Mercury, Venus, Mars, Earth, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune
Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Saturn, Jupiter, Uranus, Neptune
Venus, Mercury, Earth, Mars, Saturn, Jupiter, Neptune, Uranus
Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune
Mars, Venus, Earth, Mercury, Jupiter, Saturn, Neptune, Uranus

string.name: question_five
string.b: #5: Which of the following is larger in diameter, Titan or Mercury?

string.name: question_six
string.b: #6: From largest to the smallest diameter, what is the correct order of the planets in our Solar System?

resources.string: Jupiter, Saturn, Neptune, Uranus, Mars, Earth, Venus, Mercury
Saturn, Jupiter, Uranus, Neptune, Earth, Mars, Mercury, Venus
Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Earth, Venus, Mars, Mercury
Saturn, Jupiter, Neptune, Uranus, Earth, Venus, Mars, Mercury
Jupiter, Saturn, Neptune, Uranus, Earth, Venus, Mars, Mercury

string.name: question_seven
string.b: #7: Which of these planets are gas giants?

string.name: question_eight
string.b: #8: Which of these are the moons of Mars
